ss:description.ss:name: Adder XC
ss:description.ss:brief: Rugged free trader with extended cargo hold, designed for operation in low tech environments.
ss:description.ss:physical: Based on the original Adder design, for the Adder XC Outworld Workshops removed the bottom turret, and replaced it with an extended cargo hold. It is better suited for hops between star ports, rather than landing on uncivilised planets.
ss:description.ss:background: The Adder was one of the first good all round free traders. The XC model tries to specialise heavily by stripping out everything it can to add in more cargo space, leaving an ugly bulge beneath the main body. It has reduced range and acceleration, half the firepower and almost no repulsors for assisted planet landings. Less suited for smugglers, but possibly better for honest traders - as long as they don't need to run from dishonest pirates.
